examples.example: 城市中心矗立着一座宏伟的地标建筑，彰显着这座城市的独特魅力。

translate.english: A magnificent landmark building stands in the center of the city, showing the unique charm of this city.

examples.example: 学校的中心有一个美丽的花园，是同学们课后最喜欢去的地方。

translate.english: There is a beautiful garden in the center of the school, which is the place that students like to go to most after class.

examples.example: 以家为中心，我们向四周传递着爱与温暖。

translate.english: With the family as the center, we convey love and warmth to all around.
